Class MoneyVoucherServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
me.julb.applications.ewallet.services.impl.MoneyVoucherServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MoneyVoucherService
@Service @Validated @Transactional(readOnly=true, propagation=SUPPORTS) public class MoneyVoucherServiceImpl extends Object implements MoneyVoucherService
The money voucher service implementation.
